channel.title: Self-studies on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Self-studies on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Water and Life
item.description: Water Properties 1. Polarity What is it? Water molecules are polar. It made of 2 atoms of hydrogen, partialy positive charge and 1 atoms of oxygen, partialy negative charge. These atoms are hold together by Covalent Bond. Electrons gather with the oxygen atom making it Electronegative. Two different water molecule connect to one another via Hydrogen Bong, where an atom of oxygen from one water molecule attracts to a hydrogen atom of another water molecule.

item.title: Element and Atom
item.description: Matter, Elements, & Atoms What is your body made of? Body or Organism < System < Organ < Tissue < Cell < Molecule < Atom The most basic level of our body is Atom. This is why in Biology we also study about Chemistry. Matter Matter is anything that makes up the universe occupying space and having mass. It is made up of Elements. Example: human, animals, table, pen, rock…
